data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3Yf617GZrJIQ7kNvgGfpQWq&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBV2YlU32uDDPXIovgfkVBFDy4shDqVM4HhqjLHyx6tQQ&oe=6695089C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2p2lvxmO63EQ7kNvgG0sOoX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBgY4r2yXEyzWbvSNz8thOwp_pT_YmDvYn21q5kCbzT5g&oe=66951224)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2sFZBLAGnd4Q7kNvgFsHsuk&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDVzlxuoibZt8dwucY4pttS7IaJYPgjWNGcV6HmlBWv6w&oe=6694F987)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QqMTGIr_ArkQ7kNvgEml434&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCuDIpaqsJTkQzCXIDnMLd_dnHF40fCfyExJYkFIfZz_w&oe=6694EC66)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0S-5YW_ZAm4Q7kNvgFqrSU0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDLfER1nU0KWnt1fqMYAGh7dxZ1_n0UXd-gf5bROj3K1g&oe=669518D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8dzpbL0-gZsQ7kNvgEuVwtv&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDv7zXe-4Si96ZlMdsscLIKgBIX0-sHcFYrWb3OIUzIBA&oe=66951559)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gzwcuWnkUPgQ7kNvgHc5NZS&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB7vjB-BGm1lOyVbardTj95FXs1w7T4tWu5CQITfboU2Q&oe=6694FB70)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0iR8d8ioOLAQ7kNvgE2TvX0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBPsoNChJf0mIUSomrmX694MzdjNQBuayzndnmX_2aorA&oe=6694E5EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=m-W-qIJ-DgkQ7kNvgHzAqjY&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAiSN95XGKa4SR6L54L9mYcMamgF3Tq_By14jXpsS5E-w&oe=6694F997)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=sVnslAjJ7dcQ7kNvgH4s6i0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYArl2DFmMgx14miGj03ABBlS8_Tr0vYDeh_9kaDqQzw4A&oe=6695150C)
